page.title: 12Games in S. Clevedon
page.content: During{recreation}one of the favorite games is "Kick-the-can". This is simular to "Hide & seek". Other popular outdoor{games}are Rounders & French Cricket. Link touch is also popular and very good fun. This is a very fast game which is played friends. All the{children}who are caught link arms & run together to catch those who are left. Other{ {popular passtimes }are{computer games {such as "Munchman",}"Space Invaders" & "Who Dunnit?" & board games like Monopoly,Cluedo & Pushover. Many leisure hours are also spent on Skipping,Skating,Ball games & Cycling.
